Chicago, Ill
Foote, Cone & Belding
REACH OUT is the theme for the Chicago Summer Youth program, and is
being strongly supported by all communications media. Leo Burnett has
joined with Foote, Cone in development of the saturation campaign, and the
theme song, "Reach Out," was written by a Leo Burnett copywriter. (It has
been so successful it is being produced as a record.) Sammy Davis, Flip
Wilson, Ernie Banks, Willie Wood, Randy Hundley and Lou Johnson have made
TV and radio commercials, produced by Wilding, ABC, NBC, CBS andWGN-TV.
The REACH OUT telephone information center is manned by college students.
Gale Sayers is conducting Touch Football Camps in 20 parks. REACH OUT
counter cards are displayed in 200 banks.
Louisville, Ky. Zimmer-McClaskey-Lewis, Inc.
Highlight and focal point of coordinating agency's advertising and
promotion work was an hour-long TV special on JOBS (NBC). Phones were
manned during the program, and more than 1,000 jobs were offered during the
night line program.
Seattle, Washington N. W. Ayer-F. E. Baker, Inc.
Full-page public service advertisements in support of the JOBS program
have been running in the Seattle papers. Coordinating agency scheduled a
major and highly successful press conference; a JOBS folder also was prepared,
and 20-minute and five-minute speech adaptations made for the JOBS' liD-man
speakers bureau.
